title: Machine Learning Fundamentals for Metasurface Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A beginner-level customized course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, exploring fundamental principles of metasurface design through machine learning in mobile digital learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental concepts and functions of metasurfaces.
Learners can predict simple meta-atom patterns using machine learning models.
Learners can analyze the principles of metasurface design through real-world application cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
